data.title: Strengthened Regulation of the Onset of the South China Sea Summer Monsoon by the Northwest Indian Ocean Warming in the Past Decade
data.meta_description: Traditionally, a delayed (early) onset of the South China Sea summer monsoon (SCSSM) has been observed to follow a warm (cold) El Niño-Southern Oscill
